review: Bought this for my daughter to use while away at college.  It broke the first time she used it.  Unfortunately we were past the 30-day Amazon return period.  The Chromecast is supposed to come with a 12-month warranty from Google.  After trying repeatedly for two months to get Google to honor the warranty, I finally gave up.  We will buy the Amazon Fire TV Stick instead.  Based on the reviews, it sounds like a much better product.  I really don't understand why Google could not honor the warranty and just send a replacement.
author: K. Dickerson
